title: Early NBA Notes, Can The Broncos Get Right?
description:
Welcome back to (debatable) with hosts Pablo Torre and Domonique Foxworth featuring Mina Kimes! On today’s show: After the first few days of the NBA season, what have you found most interesting? Are you sure that the Broncos and Russell Wilson should be favored at home against the Jets this weekend? Is Vegas’ disrespect of the Giants this weekend warranted? Do you expect the Dolphins to pick up where they left off with Tua? Plus, what are the chances Bill Belichick’s admiration of the Bears is sincere?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Will The Broncos Get Going? NBA Reaction, Giants' Getting Disrespected?
